text: aur jab unhen sunaee jaatee hain, hamaaree khulee aayaten, to aap pahachaan lete hain, unake cheharon mein, jo kaafir ho gaye bigaad ko aur lagata hai ki ve aakraman kar denge unapar, jo unhen hamaaree aayaten sunaate hain. aap kah den: kya main tumhen isase buree cheez bata doon? vah, agni hai, jisaka vachan allaah ne kaafiron ko diya hai aur vah bahut hee bura aavaas hai
